song_lyrics: Jay Akṣharpati Puruṣhottam, jay jay Swāmī Sahajānand;
Guṇātītānand Swāmī Mūḷ Akṣhar, Sahajānand ek Parmeshvar;
Em samajīne leshe nām, te to jāshe Akṣhardhām... 2
Swāminārāyaṇ Bhagwān, Pramukh Swāmīmā vicharyā apār;
Pramukh Swāmīmā vicharyā apār, Mahant Swāmīmā vichare āj;
Mahant Swāmīmā vichare āj, anek jīvonā kalyāṇ kāj... 3
title: Jay Akṣharpati Puruṣhottam

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-2004: unknown

Category: Dhoon

Raag(s): Yaman (Kalyãn)
